quest.name: It's a Zu Out There
journal: Munifrid seeks a seasoned adventurer for an important task.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname, you are well known for your deeds as a soldier. On this day, however, I would call upon your broad experiences as an adventurer.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: As for the situation at hand, it would seem that part of our patrol route has been claimed as territory by a fearsome zu nestling. Yet we cannot simply choose to circumvent the area, lest we risk providing an unobserved entry point for imperial scouts.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: My men and I will gladly go toe-to-toe with any military opponent. But nothing in our training has prepared us to combat a foe which can soar through the ravines and swoop down upon us with impunity.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: My comrade here almost lost his arm to such an attack, and I fear it is only a matter of time ere the creature makes a kill...unless you kill it first.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: The nestling surveys its domain from a narrow pillar of rock to the northeast. Pray find this predator, and end the threat to our patrols.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: We might take the thing down eventually, but too much of our own blood would stain those rock walls. For a monster-slayer of your caliber, however, I should hope it will prove no great challenge...

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: The nestling is slain, then? I knew I had chosen the right womanman for the job.

dialogue.name: MUNIFRID
dialogue.text: I am grateful you came along before any lives were lost to that monstrous bird. You have our thanks!
